name: EDFM Uploader
author: ZaviiNet
description: The EDFM Uploader plugin allows Elite Dangerous commanders using EDMC to automatically send valuable in-game data to the EDFM (Elite Dangerous Fleet Manager) platform

name: ATEL-EDMC
author: Elite IGAU
description: Automatically collects "Codex" discovery data, and (optionally) posts public Astronomical Discovery "Telegram" style notices. NB: Ensure you're using a Python 3.7 compatible version, 1.32 or later.

name: DistanceCalc
author: Thurion
description: Displays the distance to up to 3 systems.

name: EDMC-Cannon
author: Canonn Research
description: Keeps you up to date with Canonn News, directs you to things of interest in the game and captures data that will enable us to catalogue the mysteries of the Galaxy.

name: EDMC CLog
author: Seldon Labs
description: Show if a commander was reported as a combat logger. NB: Latest code works only with EDMC versions greater than 3.46 (Python 3.7+).

name: EDMC Discord Presence
author: Elite Kode
description: Show your current location to your friends on Discord from your user profile.

name: EDMC-Screenshot
author: NoFoolLikeOne
description: Automatically renames screenshots with System and Body name, and converts them to PNG format.

name: EDMC_SpanshRouter
author: CMDR Kiel42
description: Automatically copies to your clipboard the next waypoint on a route you planned using Spansh Neutron Plotter.

name: Exploration Progress
author: DlljsCodes
description: Allows explorer players to see their progress from one star system to another.

name: Habitable Zone
author: Marginal
description: Helps explorers find high-value planets. NB: Use the GitHub master zip for Python 3.7+ compatibility.

name: LandingPad
author: bgol
description: Helps people to find their assigned landingpad position in starports.

name: Red Star Eliminator (RSE)
author: Thurion
description: Displays names and distances to nearby systems of interest for projects of EDSM. Originally designed to seek out unknown coordinate stars, it has branched out to include several other projects.

name: StreamSource
author: Marginal
description: Outputs status info to files for use as text sources in live streaming software such as Open Broadcaster Software (OBS), GameShow, XSplit, etc.
